name: trusted-clawmon
description: Curated, attack-resistant, crypto-economically secured registry overlay for MCP skills

scripts.build:all: tsc && cd dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:server & cd dashboard && npm run dev
scripts.clawhub:sync: CLAWHUB_SYNC_ENABLED=true tsx -e "import 'dotenv/config'; import { syncFromClawHub } from './src/clawhub/index.js'; syncFromClawHub().then(r => { console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)); process.exit(0); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.deploy:staking: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/deploy-staking.cjs --network monad --config hardhat.config.cjs
scripts.deploy:attestation: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/deploy-attestation.cjs --network monad --config hardhat.config.cjs
scripts.deploy:paywall: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/deploy-paywall.cjs --network monad --config hardhat.config.cjs

scripts.deploy:governance: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/deploy-governance.cjs --network monad --config hardhat.config.cjs
scripts.deploy:stake-slash: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy/deploy-stake-slash.cjs --network monad --config hardhat.config.cjs
scripts.boost:register: npx hardhat run scripts/boost/register-skill.cjs --network monad --config hardhat.config.cjs
scripts.boost:stake: npx hardhat run scripts/boost/stake-skill.cjs --network monad --config hardhat.config.cjs
